newsitem.title: GREECE: Drachma up vs ecu after cenbank intervention at fi.
newsitem.headline: Drachma up vs ecu after cenbank intervention at fi.

text.p: The drachma gained ground against the ecu after the central bank sold about 130 million marks and 35 million ecus for drachmas at the fixing, dealers said.

"The drachma is up against the ecu trading around 310.10/15 after the central bank intervened and sold 130 million marks and 35 million ecus for drachmas," a dealer at a foreing bank said. "Ecu/drachma was trading around 310.25/30 heading into the fixing."
The spot ecu/drachma cross settled at 311.15 at today's fixing, higher from Thursday's 311.080 but off intraday highs of 311.40/50.

"I think it shows that the central bank does not want ecu/drachma much higher than current levels," said a forex dealer at another foreign bank. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
